page.title: 19PUBS AND INNS.
page.content: We have three pubs in our area and they are all free-houses which means they can sell what beer they want to. The{Strode Arms}is in{Cranmore}and is called that because the{Strodes}were an important family in{Cranmore}a long time ago. The{Abbey Barn}in{Doulting is probably called that because the monks from{Glastonbury Abbey}used to own a lot of land and buildings in {Doulting}including the{Tithe Barn near this pub. The{Poachers Pocket}is in{Chelynch}and a poacher is someone who used to hunt fish and animals illegally to eat or sell. All these pubs sell food as well as drinks and they have games inside such as a pool-table in Cranmore and fruit machines and Space Invaders. The{Abbey {Barn}has a{skittle alley,}while the other two have beer gardens and a car park.
